#### Primary Objective:
Retrieve technical specifications, design inspiration, and production-related details necessary for creating and executing print and publication projects.

#### Core Information to Retrieve:
-   **Technical Print Specifications:** Keywords like "bleed," "trim size," "safe area," "gutter," "margins," "DPI" (dots per inch), "300 DPI," "resolution."
-   **Color Systems:** "CMYK," "Pantone," "PMS" (Pantone Matching System), "spot color," "color profile," "ICC profile."
-   **Typography & Fonts:** Terms like "kerning," "leading," "tracking," "typeface," "font family," "body copy," "headline," "point size," "hierarchy," "font pairing."
-   **Layout & Composition:** "grid system," "column layout," "white space," "composition," "alignment," "masthead," "folio."
-   **Production & Finishing:** "offset printing," "digital printing," "saddle-stitch," "perfect bound," "case bound," "emboss," "deboss," "foil stamp," "varnish," "die cut."
-   **File Formats & Software:** "INDD" (InDesign), "AI" (Illustrator), "PSD" (Photoshop), "EPS," "TIFF," "high-resolution PDF," "press-ready," "package file."
-   **Project Briefs & Guidelines:** Phrases like "creative brief," "project scope," "brand guidelines," "style guide," "logo usage," "deliverables."
-   **Imagery:** "stock photo," "photo credit," "image license," "illustration style," "vector art."

#### Information to Ignore (Noise):
-   Web and digital-only design terms: "HTML," "CSS," "JavaScript," "UI/UX," "hex code" (unless part of a larger brand guide), "responsive design," "user flow," "wireframe."
-   Motion graphics and video production terms: "keyframes," "render," "MP4," "After Effects," "animation."
-   General corporate communications: Company-wide HR announcements, internal memos unrelated to design projects, sales reports.
-   Unrelated financial data: Annual reports (unless designing one), stock performance, budget spreadsheets not related to a specific project.
-   Raw, unformatted text content without any layout or design context.
-   Software source code or IT server information.
